sections.title: The Fish in Alchemy
sections.thesis: Alchemical imagery as a symbolic language for transformation, with the fish as a motif of the opus.

sections.body: This chapter matters because it clarifies the lens you will use throughout Aion: symbolic tensions are not distractions, but the material of psychological transformation.

terms.definition: A symbolic tradition whose images can be read as dramatizations of psychological transformation processes.
The "raw material" of transformation: undifferentiated, chaotic, or conflicted psychic content at the start of the opus.
A historically layered motif in Aion that carries paradoxical meanings of totality, salvation, and shadow.
